import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Defenders Summary</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v31.02/defenders/summary"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"manageDefenders","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Lists the number of Defenders in each defender category.


### cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL command that retrieves a summary of Defenders:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/defenders/summary
```
